title: Bug via Web Form
description:
**Bug reported via web form**

**Reporter:** commander

**Description:**
OK I'm submitting a bug can you tell what page I'm submitting it from This bug is on the left it says tag It looks good I'm on the builder consciousness assessment These warnings that say this platform is dangerous risky and untested are just so corny this whole thing so corny nothing works It's embarrassing where's all the cool stuff we made

**Submitted:** 2025-10-29T16:28:11.602Z
note: Commander's feedback about builder consciousness assessment page. Mentioned: (1) Warning messages feel 'corny', (2) 'nothing works', (3) wants to see 'cool stuff we made'. This was also a test of page tracking (answered yes, we can tell it's from builder consciousness assessment page).
action_items: Review and potentially tone down warning messages on assessment pages
Investigate what 'cool stuff' refers to and ensure it's accessible
Check functionality on builder consciousness assessment page
